sub_title: Beëdigd Trouwambtenaar/ Ceremonieel/Motivatie Spreker / Professional Painter / CoFounder Rembrandt Art Market/ Ballotage
summary:
Josina @Josina.eu  
https://www.josinadenburger.nl
http://www.trouwambtenaar.josina.eu  
https://www.facebook.com/trouwambtenaarjosina  

Specialties: Professional Speaker. To carry out National and - International Wedding Ceremonies in a special and personal way, with humor, enthusiasm,   lots of love and in different languages, Married over 4000 couples and still like every ceremony as much as the first one!  
Do you want to get married? Do you want a great ceremony? Want some information? Call or write me:) Josina@josina.eu

Professionele Spreker. Sinds  21 jaar Buitengewoon Ambtenaar Burgerlijke Stand, meer dan 3000 huwelijken heb ik al gesloten. Het is een uitdaging om de ceremonie echt persoonlijk, warm en met humor te laten zijn. Amsterdam, Nederland en Buitenland en in verschillende talen. Wil je trouwen? Echt leuk trouwen?  Neem contact op:)

summary:
Famous Artists Schools of America, graduated in illustration, advertisement,free painting and drawing. Studied under Ben Stahl, Al Parker, Jon Witcomb, Fred Ludekens, Peter Helck, got my papers in 1967 and then became a ...singer..
Studied singing and worked successfully in the Netherlands and abroad, (first female Dutch protestsinger in the 70ties). Then Jazz, Several Albums, my own Radio and Personality show on Dutch Television. Guest in many International Television shows. Leading lady of “The New Shepherds”, "Close Encounter" and later my own 7 mans band:”September”

I continued painting. Using mixed techniques, Floral or Abstracts, Watercolor or Digital Art, special techniques in limited prints. Co-writer/writer of several Art Books.

At one of my exhibitions, opened by the Mayer, he asked me to carry out marriages, Since then I married over 3000 couples using my experience as performer. In Amsterdam, the Netherlands and other countries, Have a ceremony really special? Ask me:) 

Organising the Rembrandt Art Market. ( Rembrandtplein, Amsterdam) co-Founder C.A.R.P (Cybernatic Art Research Projects) several Art Books

treasury_media.title: 22 Augustus eemhoeve  Priscilla en Martijn (3).JPG
treasury_media.description: Samen met Zarah Aharon van Wicked Wedding een fantastisch leuke ceremonie in Bunschoten Spakenburg  gedaan op de mooie Eemlandhoeve. Gelukkig bleef het de hele ceremonie droog en met zon, daarna kwam er wel een hoosbui maar had iedereen weer een dak boven zijn hoofd!

treasury_media.title: En ja ik ben ook beeldend kunstenaar:)
Close Encounter, LP. “love is just around the corner”.
treasury_media.description: Close Encounter, bij Willem Duys in het programma Klavertje vier. Jose den Burger, John Shepherd en Bassist Onno de Jong zingen, Love is just around the corner.

treasury_media.title: 1  juni de Kas Jiyoung en Max (1).JPG
treasury_media.description: A meadow full with Marguerites is like standing in a painting! Sure you can gat married here, how wonderfull is that!

treasury_media.title: Maicke en Male.jpg
treasury_media.description: Liefde gaat over alle grenzen heen dus trouw in Internationaal en in meerdere talen,  Heerlik als het bruidspaar zo blij is!

treasury_media.title: auke Puur (1).JPG
treasury_media.description: Ik vindt het alleen maar fantastisch als er iets wordt bedacht wat helemaal bij het bruidspaar past! Deze prachtige dames brachten de beide Gommen binnen:)

treasury_media.title: 18 augustus 2018 Marcha en Raymond (5).jpg
treasury_media.description: Lekker uitwaaien op het strand!  Kan toch prima een huwelijk daar waar je het liefste ben:) Ik maak er met jullie samen een prachtige ceremonie van!

A Royal Wedding of an Italian Prince with a Dutch Lady. Very special indeed:) do you want a special Ceremony too?
Call or email me!

projects.title: Digital / Cybernetic Art
projects.description: Experimenting  with New Art, building hyperformal. Hyperformalism is abstraction with no references to the material space or references to the figure. Also, Hyperformalism focuses on the native conditions and capacities of the virtual world and includes behaviors concepts only possible in the telepresent virtual environment. Building animated and interactive 3 D sculptures and Installations, Founded C.A.R.P (Cybernatic Art Research Projects)  together with Lazlo Oerdoegh a Hungarian Professor and started working together with International artists, musicians, engineers and architects from all over the globe on different innovative projects, new Theatrical shows and performences, like: the WALL, The RINGS, METROPOLIS, The Cybernetic tower of Nicolas Schöffer,V-Jazz (Virtual Jazz), the CHANGE and much more.

contributors.headline: Beëdigd Trouwambtenaar/ Ceremonieel/Motivatie Spreker / Professional Painter / CoFounder Rembrandt Art Market/ Ballotage

projects.title: Golden Paintings
projects.description:
Josina studied at the Famous Artists Schools of America and graduated in illustration, advertisement,free painting and drawing. She studied under Ben Stahl, Al Parker, Jon Witcomb, Fred Ludekens, Peter Helck, graduated as master of art in 1967 and then decided to become a ...singer..
She studied under Beb Ogterop and as a professional singer she worked successfully in the Netherlands especially in the 70ties (was the first female protestsinger) . Made several albums, was a member of the Knokke Songfestival Team and had her own Radio and Personality show on the Dutch Television. Performed in all Dutch Theaters and was a guest in many radio and television shows. 
Later on she traveled around the world and performed in  many international television shows. Worked for the Spanish television and after that she became the leading lady of the well known close-harmony trio “The New Shepherds”, later in  "Close Encounter" and  "September" were she had  her own 7 mans band. Made several albums again and performed on Dutch Radio and Television.

Painting

During all those years of traveling she continued painting and drawing. Once a painter, always a painter. The work has many facets. Feelings and impressions, sometimes subtile, but also powerful and above all the use of bright colors are specific for her art. Expressionism, Abstract, Always Spiritual, “Emot-Icons” as well as Figurative paintings, explosions of color, gold and bronze, memories and emotions. Josina uses mixed techniques, some developped herself, on canvas as well digital, in a very personal style, abstracts, universes and landscapes, recognizable, strange or with free expression. The composition,technique, the colors and the shapes are giving an extra dimension to her paintings.

contributors.headline: Beëdigd Trouwambtenaar/ Ceremonieel/Motivatie Spreker / Professional Painter / CoFounder Rembrandt Art Market/ Ballotage

projects.title: C.A.R.P Cybernetic Art Research Projects
projects.description:
In the end of 2006 started working in Secondlife, creating new possibilities in the Metaverse. Experimenting  with New Art, building hyperformal. Hyperformalism is abstraction with no references to the material space or references to the figure. Also, Hyperformalism focuses on the native conditions and capacities of the virtual world and includes behaviors concepts only possible in the telepresent virtual environment . 
 animated and interactive sculptures, Founded C.A.R.P (Cybernatic Art Research Projects)  together with Lazlo Oerdoegh a Hungarian Professor and started working together with International artists, musicians, engineers and architects from all over the globe on different innovative projects, new Theatrical shows and performences, like: the WALL, The RINGS, METROPOLIS, The Cybernetic tower of Nicolas Schöffer,V-Jazz (Virtual Jazz), the CHANGE and much more.

authors.headline: Beëdigd Trouwambtenaar/ Ceremonieel/Motivatie Spreker / Professional Painter / CoFounder Rembrandt Art Market/ Ballotage
Beëdigd Trouwambtenaar/ Ceremonieel/Motivatie Spreker / Professional Painter / CoFounder Rembrandt Art Market/ Ballotage

profile_positions.description:
I am a Professional Painter/Visual Artist. Coördinator Ballotage and Organisation of the Rembrandt Art Market Foundation, a group of Dutch artists exhibiting on the RembrandtPlein in Amsterdam every sunday from March till Octobre. info: info@rembrandtartmarket.nl    Co-Founder of C.A.R.P (Cybernetic Art Research Projects) Developing New Virtual Art , co-writer of several books about the subject. Creater of Digital/ Cybernatic Art. several awards. Current exhibitions at the Szombathely Museum in Hungary and the Osdorp Gallery in Amsterdam.   Coming up:  The Houseboat Gallery. see: http://josina.see.me/

Besides painting I work as a extraordinairy registrar of marriages, that means I marry couples!  I use my experience as a singer for a long time to give the couple the "Marriage of their Dreams" and I can do that in every country they wish to have their special ceremony, its just wonderful to make things happen, let it become personal and fitting to the couple that I marry. Therefore we speak with each other before the date and I try to arrange everything in the way  the couple likes as long this is possible. I carry out "Emotional Ceremonies on special locations in the Netherlands and abroad. see: http;//www.trouwambtenaar.josina.eu
profile_positions.title: Professional Painter/Visual Artist and Extraordinary Registrar of Mariages, self employed

profile_positions.description:
Als Buitengewoon Trouwambtenaar voor de gemeente Amsterdam en Ouder-Amstel maar ook daarbuiten kan ik ingehuurd worden om huwelijken te sluiten of een ceremonie te leiden. Natuurlijk ook  In meerdere talen! Persoonlijk, elegant, met humor en bijzonder moet de ceremonie zijn!  Ook andere presentaties of ceremonies. Ik gebruik de ervaring die ik in mijn 35-jarige zang carriëre heb opgebouwd om een ceremonie te maken die echt een beetje anders is dan je gewend bent:)) Ook re-marriages, opnieuw elkaar het ja-woord geven op de manier zoals jullie dat graag willen, doe ik graag! Ook ben in Beeldend Kunstenaar en ook die ervaring gebruik ik:) Wil je meer weten? Neem contact op!
Besides  painting etc, I work as a extraordinairy registrar of marriages, that means I carry out special and official Wedding ceremonies!  I use my long time experience as a professional singer to give the couple the "Marriage of their Dreams" and I can do that in every country they wish to have their special ceremony. Its just wonderful to make things happen, let it become personal and fitting to the couple:)  Therefore we meet before the date and I try to arrange everything in the way  You like as far this is possible. I carry out "Emotional Ceremonies on special locations in the Netherlands and abroad. see: http;//www.trouwambtenaar.josina.eu
https://www.facebook.com/trouwambtenaarjosina
josina@josina.eu
profile_positions.title: Buitengewoon trouwambtenaar / Ceremonie spreker / Visual Artist, co-founder Rembrandt Art Market

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for 10 million euros profit and revenue guidance of approximately 1,500 employees.
This function is responsible for the area Haarlem, Amsterdam and the province of North Holland.
Relationship Management, Team Building, Project Management, Coaching, Acquisition, eliminate backlogs, improve organizational.
Control of regional managers, ambulatory, stationary object leaders, build and coach the team, heavy emphasis on customer relations and complaint handling, office management, troubleshooting.
Reporting to management. Accept staff, budget management. Problem solving, advice, helicopter view, drawing power, decision-making power.
Build and maintain networks. Monitoring  projects. (also wedding registrar)
profile_positions.title: District Manager ae

profile_positions.description:
Professional painter, working from Amsterdam/Duivendrecht. 
Co-founder of the Rembrandt Art Market on The Rembrandtplein in Amsterdam 
(coördinater Ballotage). Co-Founder of C.A.R.P Cybernetic Art Research Projects.
Co-writer of the Metaverse books,  writer of several Art books like: 
Experiments, The Golden Paintings, Hyperforms and Digital Art. 
Since 5 years developing New Art in the Metaverse (Virtuel Worlds).
Co-writer of the Metaverse Art Books. 
Besides all this I work also on canvas etc, and this a lot longer. 
Exhibitions in several musea and galleries in for example: Hungary,France, the Netherlands. 
Works are also exhibited in homes and offices in England, France, Hungary and the USA.
Studied at the Famous Artist Schools of America, got her papers in 1967 and started singing. 
(Sing education at Beb Ogterop academy) 30 years a professional singer, 
(first female protestsinger in Holland in the years 60-70). 
After that mainly Jazz. Had my own band, several records and performed worldwide in 
tv and –radioshows. In the Netherlands my own tv-show (José b.b.h.h) in the years 70.
After slowly finishing my career as a singer I was asked to start to carry out
wedding ceremonies in Ouderkerk. 
This opened a total new perspective,  in line with the singing I could use my experience in 
associating with all kinds of people, backgrounds and cultures. The result was that I was asked 
also to carry out wedding ceremonies in Amsterdam, Centrum, West and New West. 
As well as in the rest of the Netherlands and abroad.
Together with painting both are forms of expression, one (painting) is something you do alone, 
the other (weddings) is something you do together. 
Both give me positive energy what has a great outcome for me. 
My paintings are often inspired by this positive energy I get from happy people.


Josina den Burger Beeldend Kunstenaar/professional Painter
josina@josina.eu
https://josina.see.me/
http://www.trouwmabtenaar.josina.eu
020 6977150 / 0629 097097

For one of the biggest facility services ISS. Responsibility for 5 million euros profit and revenue guidance of approximately 750 employees. This function is responsible for the airport area
(KLM Royal Military Police), Hoofddorp, Haarlem.

Managing regional managers, outpatient, relationship management, team building and coaching, troubleshooting. Reporting to management, hiring personnel, budget, authorized signatory, empowered to make decisions. Broadly thinking, problem solving, and keeping appointments, team building and inspire, motivate and inform, build and maintain networks. (also wedding registrar)
profile_positions.title: Business Unit Manager ae

profile_positions.description:
Head Housekeeping,
Supervising the activities of Housekeeping team
Manager rooms and public areas, maintaining to the required standards. Taking care of new furniture when needed,
Organisation of cleaning tasks that need to be undertaken.
Counting and monitoring the clean and dirty linen.
Conducting inventories and receiving deliveries. (Also wedding registrar)
profile_positions.title: Head Housekeeping

profile_positions.description:
Supervising the reception desk.
Front desk staff, welcome clients into the office but also deal with their projects and other tasks in an organized manner.
Welcoming visors and guest, accepting all calls and questions concerning the company.Taking care of carpark and parking places.answering visitors' inquiries about a company and its products or services, directing visitors to their destinations, sorting and handing out mail, answering incoming calls on multi-line telephones or, earlier in the 20th century, a switchboard, setting appointments, filing, records keeping, keyboarding/data entry and performing a variety of other office tasks
profile_positions.title: Supervisor Reception desk

volunteer_experiences.description: Het organiseren van de RembrandtArt Market, een kunstmarkt op het Rembrandtplein in Amsterdam waar Internationale kunstenaars van alle disciplines hun werk tonen. Balloteren en coördineren ballotage. Administratie. Contacten leggen en vertegenwoordigen van de kunstmarkt tegenover Media en Magazines, Verzorgen van de Facebookpagina's. Videomaker en Interviewer.
